Comments_List: I feel that I am better at reading papers than I was before and have a broader understanding of scientific methods in a number of different areas.

The NIH required responsibilities were actually incorporated into our medical school lectures, so we should try not to be redundant in this course. It would also open up a lot of time to get more research topics covered!
Yes. I think it was a great at to learn what is being done in other fields!
